name: Just Flick The Box
description:
Just Flick The Box is an endless runner game where the player flicks left or right to shoot a cube diagonally.
Player have to avoid staying on platforms for too long or they’ll fall.
The level will randomly generate platforms as the player progress.

MAGES Institute of Excellence

Just Flick The Box was developed over a 6 week period by DGDT Student Edwin Ng as part of the Mobile Game Development Module.

Credits Assets:

Fonts used specifically for Scores UI - VCR OSD Mono by Riciery Leal 

Background - AllSky Free 10 Sky / Skybox Set by RPGWHITELOCK

Music - 8bit Bossa, and Next to You by Joth, Jordan.

Sound Effects - 512 Sound Effects (8-bit style) by SubspaceAudio, Juhani Junkala
